ResourceHeader.ResourceName: JUICE - Jovian Magnetic Field Models - JRM33 + Con2020 field model - CReMA 3.0
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: JRM33 + Con2020 jovian magnetic field model
ResourceHeader.Description:
Magnetic field along s/c orbit is being real-time calculated. S/C and sampling time should be defined by user.
Jovian magnetic field of JRM33 (Connerney et al., 2022) and CON2020 (Connerney et al., 2020) models are used in calculations.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: James, M. K., Provan, G., Kamran, A., Wilson, R. J., Vogt, M. F., Brennan, M. J., Cowley, S. W. H. (2023). libjupitermag (v1.1.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7592249

InformationURL.Name: Connerney, J., Timmins, S., Oliversen, R., Espley, J., Joergensen, J., Kotsiaros, S., et al., (2022). A new model of Jupiter’s magnetic field at the completion of Juno’s prime mission. Journal of Geophysical Research: Planets, 127(2), e2021JE007055
James, M. K., Provan, G., Kamran, A., Wilson, R. J., Vogt, M. F., Brennan, M. J., Cowley, S. W. H. (2023). libjupitermag (v1.1.1). Zenodo.
Wilson, R.J., Vogt, M.F., Provan, G. et al. Internal and External Jovian Magnetic Fields: Community Code to Serve the Magnetospheres of the Outer Planets Community. Space Sci Rev 219, 15 (2023)
